scripts.start-users: cd services/users && mvnw clean package -DskipTests && java -jar target/users-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
scripts.start-chats: cd services/chats && mvnw clean package -DskipTests && java -jar target/chats-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
scripts.start-posts: cd services/posts && mvnw clean package -DskipTests && java -jar target/posts-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
scripts.start-interactions: cd services/interactions && mvnw clean package -DskipTests && java -jar target/interactions-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
scripts.startAll: concurrently "npm run start-ui" " npm run start-users" "npm run start-chats" "npm run start-posts" "npm run start-interactions"
